alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 8:49PM PST until November 09 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph are expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in favored locations. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Malibu Coast, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
